Package org.phantomapi.clust

Contains a rubust, powerful configuration and key value data storage system

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AsyncConfigurable
    Represents an object that is async and configurable
    AsyncMultiDataHandler<T,V>
    An interface for handing multiple data clustered objects with the same relative type.
    Configurable
    Make an object configurable
    DataEntity
    Represents a data entity
    DataInputtable  
    DataOutputtable  
    JSONString
    The JSONString interface allows a toJSONString() method so that a class can change the behavior of JSONObject.toString(), JSONArray.toString(), and JSONWriter.value(Object).
    MultiDataHandler<T,V>
    An interface for handing multiple data clustered objects with the same relative type.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AsyncDataController<T extends AsyncConfigurable,V>
    A Data Controller
    Cluster  
    ClusterBoolean  
    ClusterDouble  
    ClusterInteger  
    ClusterLong  
    ClusterString  
    ClusterStringList  
    ConfigurableController
    Represents a configurable controller
    ConfigurableObject
    Represents a configurable object
    ConfigurationHandler
    The heart of dataclusters.
    Database
    Abstract Database class, serves as a base for any connection method (MySQL, SQLite, etc.)
    DatabaseConnection
    A simple databse connection pojo holder
    DataCluster
    The data cluster holds keyed values in paths ready to be written to files in different ways
    DataController<T extends Configurable,V>
    A Data Controller
    DataFile
    Represents a data file
    DataInput  
    DataOutput  
    HTTP
    Convert an HTTP header to a JSONObject and back.
    HTTPTokener
    The HTTPTokener extends the JSONTokener to provide additional methods for the parsing of HTTP headers.
    JSONArray
    A JSONArray is an ordered sequence of values.
    JSONDataInput  
    JSONDataOutput  
    JSONML
    This provides static methods to convert an XML text into a JSONArray or JSONObject, and to covert a JSONArray or JSONObject into an XML text using the JsonML transform.
    JSONObject
    A JSONObject is an unordered collection of name/value pairs.
    JSONStringer
    JSONStringer provides a quick and convenient way of producing JSON text.
    JSONTokener
    A JSONTokener takes a source string and extracts characters and tokens from it.
    JSONWriter
    JSONWriter provides a quick and convenient way of producing JSON text.
    LinkedDataCluster
    A linked data cluster is cropped from a data cluster and can flush information back to the parent data cluster
    MySQL
    Connects to and uses a MySQL database
    PlayerDataHandler<C extends Configurable>
    A PlayerDataController
    PlayerDataSet
    Load and save player objects in a data folder
    SQLite
    Connects to and uses a SQLite database
    SQLiteHandle  
    XML
    This provides static methods to convert an XML text into a JSONObject, and to covert a JSONObject into an XML text.
    XMLTokener
    The XMLTokener extends the JSONTokener to provide additional methods for the parsing of XML texts.
    YAMLDataInput  
    YAMLDataOutput

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ClustAsyncAlreadyLoadingException  
    ClustAsyncException  
    ClustException  
    JSONException
    The JSONException is thrown by the JSON.org classes when things are amiss.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    AsyncConfig
    Signals that this config can be async loaded and saved
    ColdLoad
    DO NOT Hotload config changes
    Comment
    Define a comment for a keyed field
    HandledConfig
    DO NOT Back up this config
    Keyed
    Define a key for a field to be modified
    Tabled
    Define a table if this config is going to be used with databases

Package org.phantomapi.clust Description

Contains a rubust, powerful configuration and key value data storage system
